MailTemp.Subject: Welcome to GE Fingerprints System | Agency User
MailTemp.Body:
Hi $Name$,
Welcome to the GE Fingerprints System. You are already registered with agency $AgencyName$
Here are the access details:
URL: $Link$
Username (Email): $Emailid$
If you don't remember your password, please click on forget password link in provided url mentioned above
If you have any questions or need support, email us at support@gefingerprints.com
Thank You,
GE Fingerprints Team
